tool_description: The StarCraft 2 API offers the StarCraft II news, gameplays, guides, top players, and other information.
title: StarCraft II

api_list.name: GetTopics
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://starcraft-ii.p.rapidapi.com/topics/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "starcraft-ii.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetCommunitiesByTopic
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://starcraft-ii.p.rapidapi.com/communities/{topic}/page/{page}/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "starcraft-ii.p.rapidapi.com"
}
